bio: •Slovenia/26 •Outdoors↟▲ •Photography [≎] •Alpina ambassador •Never again say "I can't do this" and start saying "how will I do this". ♏

posts.description: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched, they must be felt with the heart! 🗻❄️🌨☀️
Some people get expensive gifts for their birthdays. This is my own special gift for my soul. Thanks to everyone for making this day so special. 🗻☀️🦂
One small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day! 🌲🌳🗻🌿🍃🍁
In every walk with nature one recieves far more than he seeks. 🌳🌲🍃🍁
Amazing view from mt. Begunjscica to Planinca. 🏔☀️❄️🌬

After that awesome sunrise at Kredarica it was time to go to the top of mt. Triglav. The conditions were perfect that morning and most important, no crowd. 🙌🏔Perfect warming up for the winter this year. 👌❄️13092017
Julian Alps inside the tiny
Dogs teach us a lot of things but none more important than to love unconditionally.🐕🐶
Feel this view. 🏔🏔🌲☀️
"Good morning sir, would you like to join us?" 🐑 😄 Aparently I was more interesting than that awesome sunrise. 😅⛰☀️🙌
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.🏔☁️☀️✨

"What we see, depends on what we look for." ✨🌍

Nothing is softer and more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it. 🌲🍃🌳☔️💦

Never stop learning, because life never stops teaching. ✨
⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯⋯
One more day to remember! Yesterday's hike to Veliki Draski vrh (2243m) was really awesome! The sun was shining, there was almost no wind and we haven't seen any people throughout the whole day, perfection! 🏔❄️☀️🙌
Do me a favour.☺️ Start each day with a smile! 😁🏔☀️💙
Be the person your dog thinks you are. 🐶
If we had no winter the spring would not be so pleasant, but winter just doesn't wat to say goodbye this year. ☀️🗻🌲
I hope the days come easy and the moments pass slow. May each road lead you to where you want to go. ✨🏔🔝😍

On our way back from Kredarica, with winds around 70kmh and -25🌡. Enjoyed every second of it! 🏔🌬💨❄️
.
.
.
One of the most beautiful places to visit in autumn is Slemenova Spica, because of the golden larch trees.🍁🏔☀️
We've got clouds in our heads, dreams in our skies. 🏔❄️🙌
You're not in the mountains, the mountains are in you. 🏔☀️🙌✨
Nature is taking it's rest in the most beautiful way possible. 🍁🍂🍃
Such a perfect day at Lago di Fusine in Italy. Im really happy I got a few days off work to enjoy the colors. 🎨⛰☀️☁️🍂

Stay positive, tomorrow will be amazing. 🏔🌄🔥 .
.

The sun sets only to rise again. 🌄🏔🔥💥

.
.

I wish you all the best in 2017, may this year be filled with magic and moments you've always dreamed about. Be ready to overtake any challenge given, you are your own motivation! Also don't forget who to thank, for the best years in the past. ✨🌟💫🎊🥂
.
.
.
"One last look and then we can go. Just to make sure I will always remember it right." 🏔❄️☀️ 08042018📸

Is there anything else to wish for? Weeell....I wouldn't complain for some sun. 😬✌️☀️But despite the cold it was just pure happiness to be surrounded by mountain walls, with awesome company and most important, the snow was perfect pow wow. 👌❄️We didn't reach any mountain tops so I had to satisfy myself with this little peak. 😄🙌🏔⛷ .
.
.
Sometimes what you're looking for, comes when you're not looking at all. 🏔🌲☀️💫
If your heart is in the right place, the rest of you will follow. 🗻❄️🏂☀️

• Surrender to what is •
• Let go of what was •
• Have faith in what will be •

It was really worth sleeping for only an hour and a half tonight for this. 😏📷🌞
You have to fight through some though days to earn the best days of your life. 🌳🌲🍃🍁🍂🗻💧
On the way to the top of mt. Triglav. 🙌 Perfect early winter conditions. 👌❄️🏔13092017

My love for this planet is simple, because it's the only place with beautiful mountains and good friends. ✌️🏔😊 Of course there are many other things and feelings that count, depends on what you look for. But unfortunately we're not doing a very good job, if we want to leave it like that, for the next generations. We need to act now, ignorance is only making it worse. 😔🌍 08042018📸
No winter lasts forever, no spring skips it's turn. 🗻❄️🌲
When everything feels like an uphill struggle, just imagine the view from the top. 😊❄❄❄⛄

What a start of 2017! I've learnt a lot today, because the conditions were very tricky above 2500m, but still an awesome experience! Just dare to try things that you're dreaming about and get rewarded. 🏔🌬❄️💨
.
.
.
.

Goodbye spring! 🌼🏔☀️🌲

zelene livade s teboj,
najlepse so, ko cveto,
zelene livade s teboj. 😊💚

"Walk towards the good in life." ✨🐾

So awesome that snow came early this year! Can't wait for more winter hikes! Pic taken on the way back to Mala Mojstrovka. ☀️❄️🏔🙌 18112017
Whaaat an awesome hike and climb to the top of mt. Begunjscica this morning. The wind was crazy up there, but it was spectacular.👌🌬🏔❄️ ☀️
Flying sparks at the frozen lake. 🔥💥☄️
Morning glow in the mountains with a little help of the 🌬✨The pic was taken on the way to mt. Vrtaca. 🏔☀️21012018

How could it be any better? Watching the sunrise at around 2000m and just accepting all the good vibes you get inside, knowing it was totally worth getting up that early. 🙏🏔💙😍 And everything was even better because of the best company 🤘 @nejajesenko @janezpfeifer @erzarj32

That feeling, when you're looking at it from the distance your whole life, you see countless photos, hear a lot of great stories, but THEN.....you finally make it on top of mt. Triglav..well that feeling is insane! ✨🏔🙌🤘
This was by far one of the best days to remember. 🤘😍20022017
Feels like walking on ☁️🤤. This one is from the hike to the Komna and Bogatin hut in February. For me, it was one of the nicest and easiest hikes this winter. 🏔❄️☀️👌 11022018
Just have to post one more click of these guys. They made that sunrise pretty special. 👌🐑⛰☀️ Mt. Triglav in the background on the left and mt. Mali Draski vrh on the right. 🌄
Beautiful things truly don't ask for atention. 🏔🌲☀️

It's funny that the second thought I get when my alarm goes on at 3 am, is that I want to throw it out of the room. 😅My first thought is just "what the f***"😂✌️But every single time it's worth it. Everything. For this. ☀️🏔❄️👌
"Life is meant for good friends and great adventures." ✨Reaching the top of the Zelenica ferrata on a sunny afternoon. ⛰🍁☀️16102017
Tb to one of the best hiking trips this winter to Prednje Robicje, with snow up to my waist. Proper winter conditions. 25022017🙌🏔❄️☀️
Eyes that look are common, eyes that see are rare. 🌲🌳🗻🍃👀
After so many days of 🌫🌫 my mind keeps returning to places like this.🏔❄️☀️ 18032016
The world is yours to explore. If you want to see something you've never seen, you have to go somewhere you've never been. 🌎🏔❄️💙
Nature never betrayed the heart that loved her. 🌲🏔☀️

"Your body can do anything, it's your brain you have to convince." ✨
A view to remember! 🏔❄️☀️
Life is the greatest journey you'll ever be on if you make it that way. 🏔☀️🙌🌅 also shared this sunset with @aljosagracner check out his feed for more awesome shots! 👊📸
"Life will never give you more than you can handle." ✨🌤🏔🙌 •Pic taken on the way back from the Kalce Ridge at the Kamnik-Savinja Alps. 19032017
Find your freedom, live your life. ✨🏔🤘

Aand back to chasing the colors. 🙌 Amazing conditions this morning, so worth getting up so early! 🏔😍
It looks like the future will be really bright. 🏔🌲☀️💙
One of the best hikes this year, reaching the top of mt. Jalovec, 2645m. ⛰🍂🍁🙌

Walking on fresh snow with snowshoes feels like walking on clouds. ☁️😍 The conditions on Sunday were just puuurfect for a proper winter hike into the Triglav National park. ☀️👌I have to say I do prefer winter hikes over summer. 😬❄️
Waterfall Mostnica surrounded by autumn colors. 🍁🍂

The golden larches on the way back from mt. Visevnik. 🍁🍂⛰☀️

"Embrace your dreams and follow them as far as they can take you." ✨

Whaaat an awesome hike today. 🙌 Woke up at two in the morning again. To go watch the sun rise near the Triglav Lodge at Kredarica (2515m) with mt. Triglav in the background. 🙌It was so worth it especially because of 25cm of fresh snow also the light was unbelievable and the colors were amazing. 🎨😍❄️🏔
We do not see things as they are, we see things as we are. 🏔💙
What a perfect day to reset your head after 4 weeks of work. 🗻❄️🏂
Amazing morning scenery. 🏔🌄❄☀
The future lies before you, like a field of fallen snow. Be careful how you tread it, for every step will show. ❄️🗻🌲
A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart. 🌲🌳🗻🍀
Yesterday's sunrise view at mt. Golica. It's always worth getting up for a view like this.✨🏔☀️🙌

🌲❄️🗻

Sun peaking over the top of mt. Mojstrovka. 🏔🍁☀️

Sunny days come baaack! ⛰☀️🙉

.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. ✨⛰😌🙌
If you were aware that you only have this life to live. Would you do it any different? 🏔☀️🙌🎨🔥🌄

River of fog painting the lake with it's golden shine. 🏔💙💛 .
.

Just love the light leaking through the fog and the trees. 😍🌟 Couldn't decide which one is better, so I decided to post both. My first timer posting more shots in one post. 😬✌️ They are same same, but different. The first-wider one shot with f5.6 at 24mm and the second one with f14 and a little zoom. 📸 I have so many winter shots that I've never posted, maybe I'll do a little throwback sequence of this winter in the upcoming days. ❄️🏔☀️ 04032018
"Your head is your best motivation." ✨😌 The view after climbing the Cjajnik ferrata on the way up, next stop, Kosutnikov turn ferrata with it's hanging bridge for the way back. 🤤⛰☀️🙌 11102017
Heaven is under our feet as well as over our heads. 🏔❄️☀️
"Life is not measured by the breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away." ✨🌟🏔❄️ 📸 Almost at the top of mt. Triglav.

"Your heart knows the way. Run in that direction." 🏔☀️🍁
Awesome view of Vrsic pass from Prednje Robicje.

"Three choices in life: give up, give in or give it your all." ✨🤘 ---------------------------------
I often get the "why do you" and "how can you" from others. But it's never hard to do something that brings you joy on the inside and makes you a bit crazy at the same time. 😜 You need a bit of craziness to escape from the everyday life routine. 🤙🏔❄️☀️
The cost of not following your heart, is spending the rest of your life wishing you had. ☀❄️🗻🏂
Dreams don't work unless you do. Let them guide you. 🌙💫🗻❄️🌨
You know it's cold outside when you go outside and it's cold. ✌️❄️😅 This one is from last year's hike to Veliki Draski vrh. 🏔 The conditions were perfect just a liitle windy. 🌬☀️ 07122017

"Goodwill makes the road shorter" ✨

We had perfect winter conditions just about a week ago, but now it's been raining all the time. Can't wait for the snow again. ❄️ A view from the Karawanks towards the Julian Alps. ❄️🏔☀️ 30122017

A day off work to recharge. ⚡️ Also brought @benmagahy and @dids69 , camera and art department from England all the way to Viševnik to show them what Slovenia really looks like! It was an amazing day! 🌲☀️🗻
Whaaat a great day for hiking. ☀️Can't wait for more sunny days like this. But it would be great if the snow would stay at least until May. 😬👌❄️🏔

Yesterday's hike to mt. Skrlatica (2740m) in the Julian Alps was a blast. 👊Great company and beautiful autumn weather made the day even better. We also couldnt resist mt. Skrlatica's neigbour mountain, Dolkova Spica, so we climbed up there too. 🤤👌⛰☀️

"Do all that you can and all you thought you could not."✨

What can I say, not all Mondays are the same. 😬👌Yesterday was a blast! Perfect weather, perfect snow and the best company! 🏔🎿❄️ Also my first time ski touring and standing on skis after 10yrs. Still have a lot to learn. ⛷

After a whole summer of doing computer work I finally managed to go out for some night shots. It turned out to be magical. This one is for everyone that couldn't go out last night. So make a wish everyone!🎇🎇

I've seen so many clicks from Golica in the past weeks. Of course I had to go and make one too. The amount of daffodils is just amazing, surprises me every year. 🏔🌸☀️
Amazing view of the lodge and mt. Triglav inside a tiny glass ball. ✨🏔❄️🔮

That quote.."Feels good, to be lost in the right direction." Well..., it just about sums up this whole year. It was madness with a lot of ups and downs. Positivity and good thoughts is what keeps us moving forward. ✨Thanks to all the people who have been around, we have made some great memories! It wouldn't be the same without you. 🤗💙So what can I say...let's get lost in 2018 and make it even better, more awesome and with more adventures. 😁🙌 Wish you all the best on your journey through 2018. 🎊
Mt. Triglav in a ball of fire. 🔥🏔
Not sure where we passed the "heaven" sign. 😂✌️ I just love how you start hiking in the fog and then it surprises you somewhere on the way to the top. 😍❄️🏔☁️ 15012018

These winter hikes keep getting better and better. Reaching the top of mt. Vrtaca yesterday was one of the best! It was on my "wish list" for a long time. Even though it was a little windy the conditions were perfect.❄️🌬☀️🏔
Joy comes in the morning. ✨⛰☀️🙌 01082017

Whaaat a day! ❄️☀️This was by far one of the best hiking adventures. The conditions to mt. Spik were almost perfect, al frozen on the way up, and then nice and soft on the way down. ⛷ We only had to climb one part of the trail, because the snow has already melted there. The rest of the way was just perfection, but we had to watch out for avalanches. 👌🏔☀️❄️🎿
You are doing it only for yourself. Your body, your mind, your soul and your heart. 💙👊🗻❄️
